trans-unit.source: onlyUnique checks, if the given value is the first occurring. If not, it must be a duplicate and will not be copied.

trans-unit.source: ES6 has a native object Set to store unique values. To get an array with unique values you could do now this:

trans-unit.source: EcmaScript 6 is only partially implemented in modern browsers at the moment (Aug. 2015), but Babel has become very popular for transpiling ES6 (and even ES7) back to ES5. That way you can write ES6 code today!
trans-unit.target: EcmaScript 6 目前（2015年8月）仅在现代浏览器中部分实现，但是Babel在将ES6（甚至是ES7）转换回ES5方面变得非常流行。这样，您就可以立即编写ES6代码！

trans-unit.source: I don't like the for loop. it has to many parameters.i like the while-- loop. while is the fastest loop in all browsers except the one we all like so much... chrome.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢for循环,它的参数太多,我喜欢while--循环,while是所有浏览器中最快的循环,除了我们都很喜欢的chrome之外。

trans-unit.source: I expected to see that code using object { } will win because it uses hash. So I'm glad that tests showed best results for this algorithm in Chrome and IE. Thanks to @rab for the code.
trans-unit.target: 我希望看到使用对象 { } 代码将获胜，因为它使用哈希。因此，我很高兴测试在Chrome和IE中针对该算法显示了最佳结果。感谢@rab提供的代码。

trans-unit.source: I had a slightly different problem where I needed to remove objects with duplicate id properties from an array. this worked.
trans-unit.target: 我遇到一个稍微不同的问题,我需要从数组中删除具有重复id属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: I have an array of numbers that I need to make sure are unique. I found the code snippet below on the internet and it works great until the array has a zero in it. I found this other script here on Stack Overflow that looks almost exactly like it, but it doesn't fail.
trans-unit.target: 我需要确定一个唯一的数字数组。我在互联网上找到了下面的代码片段，并且在数组中包含零之前，它都可以正常工作。我在Stack Overflow的这里找到了另一个脚本，看起来几乎完全一样，但是它不会失败。

trans-unit.source: I have since found a nice method that uses jQuery
trans-unit.target: 后来我找到了一个不错的方法,使用jQuery的方法

trans-unit.source: I realise this question has more than 30 answers already. But I've read through all the existing answers first and made my own research.
trans-unit.target: 我意识到这个问题已经有30多个答案了。但我先把现有的答案都看了一遍,并做了自己的研究。

trans-unit.source: I split all answers to 4 possible solutions:
trans-unit.target: 我把4个可能的答案都分了出来。

trans-unit.source: I used
trans-unit.target: 我用的是

trans-unit.source: I'm not sure why Gabriel Silveira wrote the function that way but a simpler form that works for me just as well and without the minification is:
trans-unit.target: 我不知道Gabriel Silveira为什么要这样写这个函数,但一个更简单的形式对我来说也很好用,而且不需要减法。

trans-unit.source: If we want the objects with unique names, we should use array.prototype.findIndex instead of array.prototype.indexOf:
trans-unit.target: 如果我们想要具有唯一名称的对象，则应使用 array.prototype.findIndex 而不是 array.prototype.indexOf ：

trans-unit.source: If you do have a mixed-type array, you can serialize the hash key:
trans-unit.target: 如果确实有混合类型的数组，则可以序列化哈希键：

trans-unit.source: If you don't have it in your codebase already, install it using npm:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的代码库中还没有它,请用npm安装。

trans-unit.source: If you need to support old Internet Explorer, and thus cannot use Set, then a simple technique is to copy items over to a new array while checking beforehand if they are already in the new array.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要支持旧的Internet Explorer,因此不能使用Set,那么一个简单的技巧是将项目复制到新的数组中,同时事先检查它们是否已经在新的数组中。

trans-unit.source: If you want to keep the last occurrence of a value, simple replace indexOf by lastIndexOf.
trans-unit.target: 如果要保留最后一次出现的值，只需用 lastIndexOf 替换 indexOf 即可。

trans-unit.source: If you're okay with extra dependencies, or you already have one of the libraries in your codebase, you can remove duplicates from an array in place using LoDash (or Underscore).
trans-unit.target: 如果你可以接受额外的依赖关系,或者你的代码库中已经有了其中一个库,你可以使用LoDash(或Underscore)从一个数组中删除重复的内容。

trans-unit.source: If you're using Prototype framework there is no need to do 'for' loops, you can use http://www.prototypejs.org/api/array/uniq like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Prototype框架，则无需执行“ for”循环，可以使用http://www.prototypejs.org/api/array/uniq这样：

trans-unit.source: If you're wondering what the ... means, it's called the spread operator. From MDN: «The spread operator allows an expression to be expanded in places where multiple arguments (for function calls) or multiple elements (for array literals) are expected». Because a Set is an iterable (and can only have unique values), the spread operator will expand the Set to fill the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想知道 ... 的含义，则称为散布运算符。在MDN中：«扩展运算符允许在需要多个参数（用于函数调用）或多个元素（用于数组文字）的地方扩展表达式”。因为Set是可迭代的（并且只能具有唯一值），所以散布运算符将扩展Set来填充数组。

trans-unit.source: In modern browsers, a clean and simple solution is to store data in a Set, which is designed to be a list of unique values.
trans-unit.target: 在现代浏览器中，一种干净简单的解决方案是将数据存储在Set中，该Set被设计为唯一值的列表。

trans-unit.source: It appears we have lost Rafael's answer, which stood as the accepted answer for a few years. This was (at least in 2017) the best-performing solution if you don't have a mixed-type array:
trans-unit.target: 看来我们已经失去了拉斐尔（Rafael）的答案，该答案已被接受为几年。如果您没有混合类型的数组，那么这（至少在2017年）是性能最佳的解决方案：

trans-unit.source: It works for arrays with mixed value types too.
trans-unit.target: 它也适用于混合值类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: Just pass it the name of any array you like.
trans-unit.target: 只要把它传给你喜欢的任何数组的名字。

trans-unit.source: Simply goes through every item in the array, tests if that item is already in the list, and if it's not, push to the array that gets returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单地查看数组中的每个项,测试该项是否已经在列表中,如果不在,则推送到返回的数组中。

trans-unit.source: That's because 0 is a falsy value in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 0 是JavaScript中的虚假值。

trans-unit.source: The Array.from is useful to convert the Set back to an Array so that you have easy access to all of the awesome methods (features) that arrays have. There are also other ways of doing the same thing. But you may not need Array.from at all, as Sets have plenty of useful features like forEach.
trans-unit.target: 该 Array.from 是有用的设置返回到一个数组转换，这样你可以很方便地访问所有的真棒方法（特征），数组有。还有其他做相同事情的方式。但是您可能根本不需要 Array.from ，因为Set具有很多有用的功能，例如forEach。

trans-unit.source: The deduplicate(cars) part becomes the thing we named result when the function completes.
trans-unit.target: 函数完成后， deduplicate(cars) 部分将成为我们命名为result的东西。

trans-unit.source: The above will produce ["1",2,3,4,1,"foo"].
trans-unit.target: 上面将产生 ["1",2,3,4,1,"foo"] 。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of Set takes an iterable object, like Array, and the spread operator ... transform the set back into an Array. Thanks to Lukas Liese for hint in comment.
trans-unit.target: Set 的构造函数采用一个可迭代的对象（例如Array），并且散布运算符 ... 将集合转换回Array。感谢Lukas Liese的评论提示。

trans-unit.source: The native method filter will loop through the array and leave only those entries that pass the given callback function onlyUnique.
trans-unit.target: 本机方法 filter 将遍历数组，仅保留那些通过给定回调函数 onlyUnique 的条目。

trans-unit.source: This prototype getUnique is not totally correct, because if i have a Array like: ["1",1,2,3,4,1,"foo"] it will return ["1","2","3","4"] and "1" is string and 1 is a integer; they are different.
trans-unit.target: 此原型 getUnique 并不完全正确，因为如果我有一个类似Array的数组： ["1",1,2,3,4,1,"foo"] 它将返回 ["1","2","3","4"] 和 "1" 是字符串， 1 是整数；它们是不同的。

trans-unit.source: This solution works without any extra library like jQuery or prototype.js.
trans-unit.target: 这个解决方案不需要任何额外的库,如jQuery或prototype.js,就可以工作。

trans-unit.source: To address the problem the other way around, it may be useful to have no duplicate while you load your array, the way Set object would do it but it's not available in all browsers yet. It saves memory and is more efficient if you need to look at its content many times.
trans-unit.target: 反过来解决该问题，加载数组时不重复可能很有用，Set对象可以做到这一点，但并非所有浏览器都可用。如果您需要多次查看其内容，它可以节省内存并提高效率。

trans-unit.source: for empty arrays
trans-unit.target: 对于空数组

trans-unit.source: if you can't read the code above ask, read a javascript book or here are some explainations about shorter code. https://stackoverflow.com/a/21353032/2450730
trans-unit.target: 如果您看不懂上面的代码，请阅读一本javascript书籍，或以下有关较短代码的说明。https://stackoverflow.com/a/21353032/2450730

trans-unit.source: if you don't need to reuse the old array;btw do the necessary other operations before you convert it to unique here is probably the fastest way to do this, also very short.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要重用旧的数组;btw在转换为唯一性之前做必要的其他操作,这里可能是最快的方法,也很短。

trans-unit.source: next step use modern js.Object.keys i replaced the other for loop with js1.7's Object.keys... a little faster and shorter (in chrome 2x faster) ;). Not enough!.unique3().
trans-unit.target: 下一步使用现代js。 Object.keys 我用js1.7的Object.keys替换了另一个for循环...更快，更短（在chrome中快2倍）；）。不够！。 unique3() 。

trans-unit.source: or first occurrence:
trans-unit.target: 或首次出现。

trans-unit.target: 或在CoffeeScript中。

trans-unit.source: or non-prototype:
trans-unit.target: 或非原型。

trans-unit.target: size()
